text: Hie there Adeshewa! I'm not used to the schools in the UK, so I asked to other mentors. They told me here in the UK there are 2 big university programs on animation, one at Bournemouth and other at Hertfordshire

I know of some other universities in Europe, and I'll need to do a search for other courses that are not in universities, but if you know or have heard of any, please tell me and I can also look into those and ask around what people find of them!
